add.name: Add
add.info: Add registers A and B together and store in A

sub.name: Subtract
sub.info: Substract B from A and store result in A

ld.name: Load
ld.info: Loads the data from an address in RAM into A

exc.name: Exchange
exc.info: Exchange the values of the A and B registers
exc.result: function() { return [ '03', 'swap values of A and B' ]; }

sto.name: Store
sto.info: Stores the value of the A register into a specified location in RAM

jmp.name: Jump
jmp.info: Jump to the specified address in memory

jneg.name: Jump if Negative
jneg.info: Jump to address if A is negative
jneg.result: function(addr) { return [ addr.toString(16) + '6', 'jump to ' + addr.toString(16) + 'h if A<0' ]; }

lda.name: Load at A
lda.info: Load the data from the address given by A
